content: this pattern is for a dragonscale dice bag this pattern uses a single_crochet technique this pattern has been updated as of 2/8/2019 there is a picture tutorial that shows you how to make the bag tassel add spikes and add eyelets this bad can be modified in almost any way from size just add more rounds to the base and sides to color i hope you enjoy making one of your own they can get addictive to make though
